title: The Gentlemen's Club: A Story for All Women
description: Angie doesn't want to be a victim anymore. Deep down what she hopes for most is to find a good man to love and to feel safe and protected in this crazy world... but her fears take her down the wrong path. Angie befriends other women down on their luck and they team up to get revenge. Can Angie let go of her pain and escape the Cycle of Abuse? Will she and her friends go too far to get revenge? Will Angie find the love and protection she's looking for?
author: Becky Due
